S04n355:1: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena kevalake janapade vartanakaṃ nagaram,
S04n355:4: upetya bhadrottamāyā upāsikāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhadrottamāmupāsikāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhadrottamāyā upāsikāyāḥ purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha-mayā ārye anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam |
S04n355:5: na ca jānāmi-kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04n355:7: śrutaṃ ca me āryā bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti |
S04n355:8: tadvadatu me āryā-kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04n355:10: sā avocat-ahaṃ kulaputra anālayamaṇḍalaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ jānāmi deśayāmi |
S04n355:29: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako bhadrottamāyā upāsikāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhadrottamāmupāsikāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya bhadrottamāyā upāsikāyā antikātprakrāntaḥ ||46 ||
